lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Sara. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Sara Rosen, beloved mother of our devoted Vice President Jack (Phyllis) Rosen, dear grandmother and great- grandmother, wife of the late David Rosen, and mother of Joseph of blessed memory. Our deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President 1/3
